summary: A Simple Rss reader for Desktop. Compatible with all windows x86 and x64 with transparence effect.
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.1 Update
Small version, better script and functions.
Thank you user \"1355970\"  for help with this update.
-----------------------------------------
A Simple RSS reader for desktop. Compatible with all windows x86 and x64 with transparence effect.
To install:
Open the zip archive and run the rainmeter setup (If you dont have yet) and second execute \"Second - Skyrim RSS Reader.rmskin\"

Update time is 10 minutes and it show the latest files.

The software installs some gadgets along. If you do not like just right click and disable them.

The icon used is from here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3131

Please endorse if you like.
Thanks
author: LucasJose
